Text: Hey eztv, thank you for your many awesome uploads. You should know that the sound on this file gets out of sync at 7:55. Again, thank you for the upload!

Yes, the sound does go out of sync at 7:55.

In VLC adjust the audio synchronisation to +0.200 seconds to continue proper playback.

It doesn't just get out of sync. There are serious video distortions as well. There is a "PROPER" of this release, available from some other uploaders on the bay (The.Colbert.Report.2013.02.26.Dr.Michio.Kaku.PROPER.480p.HDTV.x2). Hopefully eztv will upload that, too, but it is available.

Ha! they did indeed! Dunno how I missed it. It's here: https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8200417/The_Colbert_Report_2013_02_26_Dr_Michio_Kaku_PROPER_HDTV_x264-2H
